test_message: Generate outlay document for claim CLM-2024-78432. Claimant: J. Smith. Third Party: ABC Insurance. Recovery Amount: £4,200. Liability: 100% third party fault. Documents validated.

breakdown.description: Total settlement amount claimed for vehicle repair and associated expenses

audit_trail.action: Intake of claim details and validated document status
Selected Standard Outlay template based on case complexity and validation
Calculated recoverable and final recovery amounts using liability %
Compiled outlay document sections and summaries
Performed data completeness and accuracy checks

document_sections.executive_summary: This outlay document outlines the recovery claim against ABC Insurance for incident involving J. Smith, with 100% liability attributed to the third party. The total recovery amount is £4,200.
document_sections.incident_details: Incident details for claim CLM-2024-78432 have been validated. Full incident report is on file. Incident date is listed as UNKNOWN.
document_sections.liability_assessment: Based on submissions and carrier evaluation, responsibility rests fully with ABC Insurance (100% liability).
document_sections.financial_breakdown: Damages incurred total £4,000 with administrative fees of £200, bringing the full recoverable amount to £4,200.
document_sections.supporting_evidence: Repair estimates and policy documents have been validated and are referenced in this outlay. No police report or witness statements were submitted. No photos attached.
document_sections.recovery_recommendation: Proceed with immediate recovery action for the total claim of £4,200 from ABC Insurance. No further legal or evidentiary review required.
